channel.title: Quest Tab
channel.description: How would you completely clear out a quest tab so it's just a blank tab and can do nothing for a 317 pi rsps?

item.title: Quest Tab
item.dc:creator: @extenze007 extenze007
item.description:
@extenze007 wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:2, topic:534845”]loop through all of the interface text ids

something like

for(int line = 0; line < 9999; line++) { player.getRS2Packet().sendString("", line); }

you’d have to change int line = 0; line < 9999; and player.getRS2Packet().sendString("", line); to work with your server and what you are trying to do. and you’d have to send the code on login. good luck with doing this and if you need further assistance post again.[/quote]
I’ve done that but my quest tab turned into makeover mages change character interface (backed up files no worries)

Read full topic

item.title: Quest Tab
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“DAn0194, post:3, topic:534845”][quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=653645.msg4379311#msg4379311 date=1383047012]
loop through all of the interface text ids

something like

for(int line = 0; line < 9999; line++) { player.getRS2Packet().sendString("", line); }

you’d have to change int line = 0; line < 9999; and player.getRS2Packet().sendString("", line); to work with your server and what you are trying to do. and you’d have to send the code on login. good luck with doing this and if you need further assistance post again.
[/quote]

That would clear all of his lines in his whole server though.[/quote]

It was an example, he obviously doesn’t know the quest tab String ids, he clearly stated that he would have to change the loop to fit his needs. Please read and use common sense.

Read full topic
